text: Chloé Zhao (, born March 31, 1982) is a Chinese filmmaker. She is known for her movie Nomadland (2020), winning a Golden Globe Award, BAFTA Award and Academy Award for Best Director—making Zhao the second woman and first Asian woman to win the category at each awards body. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Academy Award winning directors Category:Golden Globe Award winning directors Category:BAFTA Award winning directors Category:Chinese movie directors Category:Chinese movie producers Category:Chinese screenwriters Category:People from Beijing Category:21st- century Chinese writers
title: Chloé Zhao
